root.Summary: 1: Ohashi M, Holthaus AM, Calderwood MA, Lai CY, Krastins B, Sarracino D,Johannsen E. The EBNA3 family of Epstein-Barr virus nuclear proteins associateswith the USP46/USP12 deubiquitination complexes to regulate lymphoblastoid cellline growth.
